## BlockPolledBeraBorrowStore class

Ethers-based [BeraBorrowStore](./lib-base.beraborrowstore.md) that updates state whenever there's a new block.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare class BlockPolledBeraBorrowStore extends BeraBorrowStore<BlockPolledBeraBorrowStoreExtraState>
```
